Hey all, I'm John and my goal is to help teams understand and fully leverage adtech configurations and strategies. I've been in marketing and advertising as a media buyer and leading a team of media buyers. I've worked in sell-side adtech, buy-side ad tech, and data management platforms.

My experience has given me an interesting perspective on the industry and I started BrightShell to put this perspective to use for programmers, distributors, and other media sellers.

Let's work together to simplify things a little bit and move into the next quarter with a strong game plan.
